description: Gay Games Gold Medalist Trent Atkins leads the cast of Hot House Hunks as a young man visiting a Los Angeles sex club for the first time. In his most athletic performance since Sydney, Atkins takes a giant dildo and then Wolfe's fat, throbbing cock to the base.
title: Resurrection, Scene #01
